org.canova.nlp.movingwindow

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.canova.nlp.movingwindow.Window
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Window
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A representation of a sliding window. This is used for creating training examples.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
